Name: Trick & Treat Remake
About the game: - About the Remake - This is the remake version of the free game Trick & Treat . + Visual updates: Remade maps in the retro pixel art style; New UIs. + The game is now in a 16:9 widescreen size, and up to 1920x1280 resolutions (though unnecessary) + Pressing F12 can take a screenshot, instead of bring you back to the title screen (finally!) + The art is still in the old doodle-style, to keep the original cute/horror atmosphere + The puzzles, stories, and music are basically the same as the free version + Some new bonus art in Extra > Join the Rabbiton Discord!
